executable.title: UnTiltVolume
executable.description: A module to separate the tilt transform from the image volume. The output is an axis-aligned volume and the tilt transform. The origin of the output volume is updated so that the un-tilted volume placed under the tilt transform is aligned with the input volume.
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by NIH grant CA111288.

image.name: inputVolume
image.label: Input Volume
image.description: Input volume that has been acquired with tilt in acquisition matrix
